Nurturing Insan.
One experience at a time.

At Tadika Insan Alami, we give children the opportunities to get actively involved and the chances to 'be in the world doing things'.

Don't limit your child to just the indoors, glued to table and chairs. Gift your children the childhood experience that they deserve!

Learning is pure joy for the child who explores the world with wonder.

A child's relationships and experiences during the early years greatly influence how their brain grows. Meaningful experience and positive relationships are integral part of our practise.

Creativity. Collaboration.
Critical Thinking.

A child's relationships and experiences during the early years greatly influence how their brain grows. Meaningful experience and positive relationships are integral part of our practise.

Our Philosophy

Play drives the growth and development of children.

Our primary language is PLAY. Neurological and brain development in early childhood is shaped by every interaction children have and are constantly changing in response to encounters during this period. What children's need at this precious period of growth is experience that entices all of their senses.

Children need to feel safe and loved before they can learn.

The children's well being is our utmost priority. Building warm, trusting relationships with the children in our care is core to our practise. Research shows that close relationships formed in early childhood can positively impact children's academic and social-emotional skills.

The significance of character building and learner identity at young age.

Developing children's self concept, what we called "learner identity" is core to our curriculum. At TIA, being a good learner means having a go, seeing yourself as capable, and taking reasonable risks.

Our Environment

Take a look inside our classrooms and learning environment.

Our Mission

We strive to offer the children rich experience and interaction they are unable to get anywhere else. Interaction with nurturing teachers, peers, nature, community and more. Beyond the four walls. Because the world is our classroom.

Our Curriculum, Pedagogy & Practice

Developing the 5 aspects of the child.

Experience - "alami", is our pedagogy and practice. This is how we nurture and develop the 5 aspects of the child. Our curriculum meet the standard of Kurikulum Standard Prasekolah Kebangsaan (KSPK)

'Alami' is our pedagogy.

Tadika Insan Alami is an Experiencial Learning based Kindergarten for children 4 to 6 years old!

9, Lorong Perda Timur 16, Bandar Perda,
14000, Bukit Mertajam, Penang.

Tel: 013-5180585
